EmailTemplate.description: Expiring credit cards notification to user
EmailTemplate.name: FS-Expiring Credit Cards Notification Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Expiring credit cards on stored payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!OrderApi__Payment_Method__c.OrderApi__Contact__c},
Your credit card ending in "{!OrderApi__Payment_Method__c.OrderApi__Last_Four_Digits__c}" is expiring on "{!OrderApi__Payment_Method__c.OrderApi__Exp_Date__c}".
Please login to update your saved payment method or add a new one. You may update your details securely at https://portal.nysba.org/s/; or visit www.nysba.org, log in, then click on your name at the top of the screen to visit your profile. Select “Payment Methods” on the left.
For security, we ask that you log into our website directly to make the update, but if you need assistance, please reach out to our Member Resource Center at 800-582-2452 or MRC@nysba.org.
Thank you, The {!Organization.Name}
One Elk Street Albany NY 12207 518-463-3200 www.nysba.org
